text: eotteohge geuleohan joyag-i iss-eul su issneunyo geudeul-i neohuiboda ilo un wichie iss-eul ttae geudeul-on neohuiwa ui joyag-eul jonjungchi anihamyeo geudeul eun geudeul-ui ib-euloman neohuileul gippeu ge haneun deus hana geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun geojeolhago issdoda sillo geudeul daeda suneun saagham-ila
